meta_description: Professional sod installation in Edmonton, St. Albert, and Sherwood Park. Base prep, seams, fast rooting, even finish. Free quotes today. Call 587-566-9879.
intro_text: sod installation in edmonton book free estimate sod installation in edmonton installing new sod should result in a strong even lawn that performs well over time that only happens when the base is prepared properly without the right soil depth grading and drainage even high quality sod can struggle to establish at serene landscaping we install fresh sod for new lawns and full turf replacements across edmonton and nearby communities we focus on preparation first because that foundation determines how well your lawn takes root whether your project follows final grading on a new build or replaces worn out grass we build a proper soil base so roots establish quickly and grow consistently get started fresh sod for new builds and lawn replacements many projects follow final grading but we also replace existing lawns correct uneven yards and rebuild lawns that never properly took we walk the property with you to review drainage access and preparation needs before installation that planning step helps keep the process smooth and avoids unexpected issues our sod installation process a healthy lawn starts below the surface we install 4 6 inches of screened topsoil grade and roll it smooth then lay a kentucky bluegrass
